name: The Wire Loop Game VR
description: The Wire Loop Game VR brings this traditional well known game into virtual reality. The aim of the game is to guide the metal hoop along the length of the wire without it touching. If it touches the wire, or you don't complete it in time, then the buzzer will sound and you will fail.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer Additional Notes: HTC Vive required
